channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1/FRA1/RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipement operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 2, 09:00 - 13:00 UTC

Jul 6, 20:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/08/2023 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/08/2023 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will do an operation on a network equipment.

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - 54B15
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 20, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jul 4, 21:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/07/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/07/2023 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers unreachable during maintenance (30 minutes max per server)
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will relocate the servers from rack 54B15 to rack 54B18.
